item.title: Prevent from sleeping in MacOS
item.description: Previously, when taking the exam, I used to change my macOS power settings to prevent sleep. Recently, alternative methods have been found to manage sleep settings… Temporary: caffeinate -i -d -i: prevent system sleep -d: prevent display sleep Permanent:
